body:
@martinex
Her parents divorced and she moved with her mom
did she suicide in the end?

This is what I got both from the images and the few things I actually "read"
- MC sees girl he likes having sex with other clubmembers
- The second time he ¿accidentally? catches her, she casually approaches him after just getting creampied, asks him whether he saw them or not (she already knows the answer), nonchalantly admits to "be seeing" various guys (to many guys from the text I transcribed into the machine translator) and asks whether he would like to do it with her as well to keep his mouth shut
- He runs away and thinks something about discovering the true colors of the girl he liked
- Next day, she waits for him at the gate after school is over, she talks to him and take him to her house
- They have sex multiple times
- He confessed to her at the beginning of the last scene, gets turned down for some reason (she just said she doesn't like him but the expression in the previous panel shows that she feels weird after hearing his confession), he gets mad and does her roughly

This doesn't feel like netorare, unless we take into account MC's feelings alone (he liked her, confessed and got turned down for whatever reason, as fas as I saw; but before that, he saw her having sex with other guys so she had already been "taken away"). Or is it because he's "doing" (seems to be "doing", at least) the netorare because we see him only having sex with the girl after he catches her doing it with other club members?. The girl seemed to be fooling around to distract herself from her family problems, or that's what the MC wonders about in the last page if I understood correctly (withe help of machine translation). He thought that she was just using all those guys, himself included. 傷を癒すために男を求めるんですか...? (kizu wo iyasu otoko wo motomerundesuka?)
Lmao. I cant even differentiate the 2 male characters?? Makes it doesnt feel NTR.
Damn the art is soo goood made me forgot to fap
